competitors.name: OTB at the North Park Boathouse

businessProfile.name: Simply Subs
businessProfile.address: 4778 William Flinn Hwy, Allison Park, PA 15101, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 4778 William Flinn Hwy, Allison Park, PA 15101, USA

reviews.text: great selection of items and over 20 soft serve flavors to choose from. highly recommend

Stopped here on a whim during a road trip and was pleasantly surprised! If you can think of any random sandwich chain brand as the baseline for a decent sandwich shop, Simply Subs is AT LEAST two rungs higher on the ladder. I will be coming back on my next pass through.

I ordered the super steak (pictured below is the half I didn't immediately eat) for about 14$ which I think is reasonable for what is basically two big sandwiches. They REALLY pile all kinds of stuff on the sandwich. It was probably twice the thickness of sandwiches at other shops.

What else can I say? The meat was juicy without being oily, the sandwich wasn't drenched in condiments while still being satisfyingly messy, and the Mancini roll soaked it all up like a sponge.

Also the picnic benches outside are a nice touch.

Simply Subs is a local restaurant that sells submarine sandwiches, salads, sides such as fries and chicken tenders, ice creams, and non-alcoholic beverages. The sandwiches are available in many flavors. During my visit, the employees spoke nicely but had a bit of a wait. My veggie sub and my husband's ham-cheese sub tasted good. No indoor seating is available here.

Had a fantastic sub from Simply Subs on Rt 8. I had the "Super Steak" with everything on it + mayo.  I thought the price ($13.95) was very reasonable for a sub this packed with ingredients. But, know that there's a basic cheesesteak on the menu as well for only $10.95.

There isn't any inside seating, but there are three full picnic benches behind the building.

I ordered and waited in my car while it was made. Knowing how it works now, I may order before I leave my house, just in case they get busy. The wait today wasn't more than just a few minutes.

She told me they are working on getting a soft serve ice cream machine. And it's definitely worth mentioning, the staff were really friendly!!

I just love small, family owned businesses like this. It's a win-win to eat something delicious while supporting local businesses.

Today we (2) had ice cream for about the 5th time and is always delicious. Very creamy & light both vanilla and chocolate. Better yet very affordable you need to give it a try.

By the way the subs are much better than the chain sub makers

recentReviews.author: Nathan Herzog
recentReviews.text:
Stopped here on a whim during a road trip and was pleasantly surprised! If you can think of any random sandwich chain brand as the baseline for a decent sandwich shop, Simply Subs is AT LEAST two rungs higher on the ladder. I will be coming back on my next pass through.

I ordered the super steak (pictured below is the half I didn't immediately eat) for about 14$ which I think is reasonable for what is basically two big sandwiches. They REALLY pile all kinds of stuff on the sandwich. It was probably twice the thickness of sandwiches at other shops.

What else can I say? The meat was juicy without being oily, the sandwich wasn't drenched in condiments while still being satisfyingly messy, and the Mancini roll soaked it all up like a sponge.

Also the picnic benches outside are a nice touch.

recentReviews.author: James Watt
recentReviews.text:
Had a fantastic sub from Simply Subs on Rt 8. I had the "Super Steak" with everything on it + mayo.  I thought the price ($13.95) was very reasonable for a sub this packed with ingredients. But, know that there's a basic cheesesteak on the menu as well for only $10.95.

There isn't any inside seating, but there are three full picnic benches behind the building.

I ordered and waited in my car while it was made. Knowing how it works now, I may order before I leave my house, just in case they get busy. The wait today wasn't more than just a few minutes.

She told me they are working on getting a soft serve ice cream machine. And it's definitely worth mentioning, the staff were really friendly!!

I just love small, family owned businesses like this. It's a win-win to eat something delicious while supporting local businesses.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the wide selection of over 20 soft serve flavors, which are described as delicious, creamy, and light. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The "Super Steak" sub is praised for being packed with juicy meat and ingredients, offering great value compared to other sandwich shops. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The friendly and personable staff contribute to a positive dining experience, making customers feel welcomed and valued. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor online visibility - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
